QuestData.Title: The Desert Fox
QuestData.Description: Zhere is much to be done in zhis region, $r.$b$bVe bozh haf a burning passion for zhe ancient technologies here, do ve not?$b$bPerhaps zhere is a vay for us to vork togezher?$b$bLet us put zhe misunderstandinks of zhe past behind us zhen, hmm?$b$bNow, zhere is an elusive animal in zhe region to zhe east zhat I have been huntink. Brink me zhis creature as a token of your sincerity, hmm?$b$bZhen maybe I let you in on my operation...
QuestData.LogDescription: Schnottz wants you to bring him the Desert Fox.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you captured zhe Desert Fox, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: You've done it!$b$bPerhaps I can trust you vizh more serious matters, hmm?
